criteria.name: Biometric Measurements
criteria.description: Accurate fetal measurements and gestational age assessment.

scoring_guide.0: No biometric measurements or incorrect measurements
scoring_guide.1: Some measurements but incomplete or inaccurate
scoring_guide.2: Complete and accurate biometric measurements with gestational age

criteria.rationale: Accurate biometric measurements are essential for fetal growth assessment and dating.

criteria.name: Fetal Anatomy Survey
criteria.description: Systematic evaluation of fetal anatomy including all major organ systems.

scoring_guide.0: No systematic anatomy evaluation or missed major structures
scoring_guide.1: Partial anatomy evaluation with some structures missing
scoring_guide.2: Complete systematic anatomy evaluation of all major structures

criteria.rationale: Comprehensive anatomy survey is crucial for detecting fetal anomalies and normal development.

criteria.name: Placenta and Amniotic Fluid
criteria.description: Assessment of placental location, appearance, and amniotic fluid volume.

scoring_guide.0: No assessment of placenta or amniotic fluid
scoring_guide.2: Comprehensive assessment of placenta and amniotic fluid

criteria.rationale: Placental and amniotic fluid assessment is critical for pregnancy management and delivery planning.

criteria.name: Maternal Pelvic Assessment
criteria.description: Evaluation of maternal pelvic structures and adnexa.

scoring_guide.1: Basic evaluation of some maternal structures
scoring_guide.2: Complete evaluation of maternal pelvic structures and adnexa

criteria.rationale: Maternal pelvic assessment identifies conditions that may affect pregnancy or delivery.

criteria.name: Documentation and Image Quality
criteria.description: Complete documentation with appropriate image capture and quality.

scoring_guide.0: Poor documentation or inadequate image quality
scoring_guide.1: Adequate documentation with some quality issues
scoring_guide.2: Complete documentation with excellent image quality

criteria.rationale: Complete documentation ensures proper record keeping and facilitates follow-up care.

criteria.name: Clinical Impression and Recommendations
criteria.description: Provides clinical impression with appropriate recommendations and follow-up.

scoring_guide.2: Comprehensive impression with specific recommendations and follow-up

criteria.rationale: Clear clinical impression and recommendations guide obstetric management and patient counseling.
